DEFINITION: Unique identifier assigned to a product in the source platform.
Official display name of the product listed for sale.
Short descriptive title used for product listing.
Detailed textual explanation of product features and specifications.
Original listed price of the product before discounts.
Current selling price after applying discounts or promotions.
Monetary unit in which the product price is listed.
Average customer rating score given to the product.
Total number of customer reviews submitted for the product.
Total number of customer reviews available for the product.
Highlighted customer reviews considered most helpful.
Brand name under which the product is manufactured or marketed.
Product classification grouping similar items.
Top-level product classification category.
Web link representing the product category page.
Hierarchical path representing category structure.
E-commerce platform domain where the product is listed.
Direct web link to the product listing page.
Primary image link representing the product.
List of image links associated with the product.
Total number of images available for the product.
Video content associated with the product.
Name of the merchant or vendor selling the product.
Unique identifier assigned to the seller.
Average rating score assigned to the seller.
Quantity availability status of the product.
Indicator showing whether the product is currently available.
Current availability status of the product.
Stock Keeping Unit identifier used for inventory tracking.
Manufacturer assigned model identifier.
Manufacturer Part Number for the product.
Universal Product Code used for global product identification.
Amazon Standard Identification Number for Amazon products.
Global Trade Item Number used internationally for product tracking.
Color attribute of the product.
List of available color options for the product.
Size attribute associated with the product.
Available size variations of the product.
Different configurable versions of the product such as size or color.
Price reduction percentage or value applied to the product.
Total units sold for the product.
Gross Merchandise Value generated by the product sales.
Price per standard measurement unit.
Measurement unit associated with pricing.
Date and time when the product data was captured.
Number of users following the seller.
Total number of products listed by the seller.
Country identifier associated with the listing.
Organization responsible for producing the product.
High-level product grouping within a store.
Physical dimensions of the product.
Weight specification of the product.
List of materials or ingredients contained in the product.
Key product features highlighted in the listing.
Detailed technical specifications of the product.
Navigation hierarchy showing category location.
Keywords associated with the product.
Shipping and delivery information related to the product.
Policy details regarding product return and warranty.
Boolean indicator of product availability status.
